message.content:
def transform(sequence):
    return sequence[:3] + sequence[3:].replace('0', '5', 3) if sequence[:3]=='000' else sequence[:3] + sequence[3:].replace('0', '3', 3) if sequence[:3]=='300' else sequence[:3] + sequence[3:].replace('0', '6', 3) if sequence[:3]=='600' else sequence

def transform(sequence):
    return sequence[:3] + sequence[3:].replace('0', '5', 3) if sequence[:3]=='000' else sequence[:3] + sequence[3:].replace('0', '3', 3) if sequence[:3]=='300' else sequence[:3] + sequence[3:].replace('0', '6', 3) if sequence[:3]=='600' else sequence
